name: Texas Horse Racing Champion – Simulated Horseback Jockey Riding in West Haven Derby Race 2016
name_original: Texas Horse Racing Champion – Simulated Horseback Jockey Riding in West Haven Derby Race 2016
description:
Cowboys, play as a Wild West Horse Rider. Enjoy flying horses across the hurdles and hedges in the simulated Kentucky derby race. A sports simulator to enhance the feel of riding wild stallion, pony in classic San Antonia racehorse Championship.

Be the perfect jockey at the west derby race action. Tame and ride the wildest horses of the stable Let your imagination run wild: Be Arion the immortal flying horse or Pegasus, the white winged divine stallion. An action packed simulation of pedigree racehorses running and jumping on the turf. With an eagle eye, leap atop the multitude of obstacles placed to break speed. Dodge muddy patches to cross the finish line first. Earn extra cash for every clean jump. Unlock all powerful stallion, pony and steed. Defeat your rival and win the Wild West Master Title. Catch some live derby racing horse action at haven ranch horsestable.

We have tried to bring the Cowboy’s derby action of simulated race world to your mobile. Earn the title of best derby rider of the Texas Horse Racing Champion 2016, newest racehorse games.

Features of Texas Horse Racing Champion 2016:
- Realistic Wild stallion models.
- Manage speed and stamina
- Intuitive tile or touch controls for steering
- Selection of Racehorses.
- Amazing 3D animations and Texas racetracks

Catch best in the most authentic racing horse simulation.

For suggestion: Contact us at absolutegamestudio@gmail.com
